issue.title: [C++][Python] Support start == stop in list_slice kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18281](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18281). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[GitHub PR 14395 \| https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14395] adds the `list_slice` kernel, but does not implement the case where `stop == stop`, which should return empty lists.
